channel.title: Comments on: Strummer strikes a chord

item.title: By: brian
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description: And from a slightly different angle… http://ianbone.wordpress.com/2008/01/11/days-of-no-hope-part-two/

item.title: By: Politics » Strummer strikes a chord
item.dc:creator: Politics » Strummer strikes a chord
item.description: [...] freely associating wrote an interesting post today on Strummer strikes a chordHere’s a quick excerpt … a new wave of that mix of music, politics and intense collectivity….An appreciation of how widespread the affects of revolutionary politics go may help with this….To be more precise I can’t stop musing on those moments when music and politics collide and the effect they’v e had on my life…. [...]
